meanings.definition: Not characteristic of a particular season.
meanings.sent1: The store sells nonseasonal items like umbrellas all year round.
meanings.sent2: Her wardrobe consists of mostly nonseasonal clothing that can be worn anytime.
meanings.sent3: It's funny how he always wears nonseasonal shorts in the snow.
meanings.sent4: Her nonseasonal attitude towards fashion makes her stand out in a crowd.
meanings.sent5: The nonseasonal decorations in the house create a cozy atmosphere regardless of the time of year.

meanings.definition: Not dependent on or influenced by the seasons.
meanings.sent1: The greenhouse provides a nonseasonal environment for growing plants.
meanings.sent2: Their business thrives due to its nonseasonal nature, unaffected by weather changes.
meanings.sent3: It's amusing how the cat's nonseasonal fur sheds at the same rate all year long.
meanings.sent4: His nonseasonal work ethic shines through even during the busiest times of the year.
meanings.sent5: The nonseasonal fruits in the market are always fresh and available, no matter the weather outside.
